statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 100 AND completion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 100 AND training_date = '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 100 AND training_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_records WHERE training_topic = 'Safety Training';
DELETE FROM compliance_logs WHERE compliance_status = false AND compliance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_records WHERE pass_status = true AND training_date <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE passed = FALSE;
